classDiagram
  class Class01 {
    int amount
    draw()
  }
  Class01 --() bar
  Class02 --() bar

  foo ()-- Class01
---
      foo      +---------+     
       |       | Class02 |     
       |       +---------+     
       |            |          
       |            |          
       v            v          
+-------------+    bar         
|   Class01   |                
+-------------+                
| amount: int |                
+-------------+                
| draw        |                
+-------------+                
       |                       
       |                       
       v                       
      bar
